import React, { useRef, useState } from "react"; import { IonContent, IonPage, IonLabel, IonInput, IonButton, IonGrid, IonRow, IonCol, IonItem, IonList, IonRadioGroup, IonListHeader, IonRadio } from '@ionic/react'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import '../assets/css/Custom.css'; import '../assets/css/Responsive.css'; const Signup: React.FC = () => { const [selected, setSelected] = useState(); return (
{/*

{selected ?? '(none selected'} ); }; export default Signup;
